ERROR.NAME_DOESNT_MATCH_PATTERN: The name doesn't match the following pattern
ERROR.GENERAL_NAME_VALIDATION: The name must be in lowercase and between 1 and 26 characters in length. Alphanumeric characters and hyphens are allowed, however the name must begin with a letter and end alphanumerically.
